welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# pride
Generate pride images with ease!

classes.name: Pride
classes.description: The pride image generator, as used by Ayano!

methods.name: overlay
methods.description: Overlays a flag onto an image from its Buffer.

params.name: imageBuffer
params.description: The buffer of the image to overlay the flag onto

params.name: flagName
params.description: The name of the flag

params.name: opacity
params.description: The opacity to set the flag to

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the output image

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the output image. If the width is defined, it will equal that.

methods.name: agender
methods.description: Overlay the agender flag over an image!

params.name: imageBuffer
params.description: The buffer of the image to overlay the flag onto

params.name: opacity
params.description: The opacity to set the flag to

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the output image

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the output image. If the width is defined, it will equal that.
